## Bio

Nora Elhaissouni graduated from Tufts University with her Bachelor of Science in 2023. At Tufts, Nora completed a double major in Biology and Child Study and Human Development. After graduating from Tufts, she began her ScM Biostatistics program at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. She is interested in applying data science and statistical methods towards infectious disease or child health research. She hopes to gain more research experience and is looking for a summer internship so that she can narrow her interests further.
